My Projects

Check out some of my works...

ZABBIX

An official website for TechnoPro Engineering (Shinagawa Branch Office) that showcase their partner product ZABBIX.

Tools:

SecureFace/D2

An official website for TechnoPro Engineering (Shinagawa Branch Office) that showcase their partner product 顔認証 (Face Recognition Device).

Tools:

COVID-19 Tracker

This applications aims to provide reliable information about the cases of Corona Virus all around the world. It also provides latest news from the WHO or World Health Organization and local news for the selected country. It has also a graph that contains stats over time worldwide or in a selected country. API used from https://corona.lmao.ninja/.

Tools:

COVID-19 Blog

COVID-19 blog aims to provide comprehensive information with regards to the number of confirmed cases in the Philippines, together with the number of deaths and recoveries, thereof. It features a tracker that monitors the abovementioned data clusters (Cofirmed cases, Deaths, Recoveries). Blogs about COVID-19 may also be posted.

Tools:

BeatBox JS

A beatbox desktop application that can be played using the keyboard which triggers the unique sound of every key. An app where you can create your beats and music. In this project, Object Oriented Programming concept was applied. NOTE! This app only runs in desktop for now.

Tools:

Guess The Number

Guess a number from 1-100. The user will input the number and the system will determine if the guess is correct or incorrect. If the guess is incorrect, the system will provide a hint if it is lower or higher than the correct number. It also has score recording function that can record the times the user successfully guessed the correct number.

Tools:

Weather Checker

An application that allows users to see the current weather in a particular city. The user must enter the city and base from Input. Search the data with API and return the fetched data to the user.

Tools:

News Portal of WHO (World Health Organization)

This website acts like a portal to WHO's Website that provides latest news. The API I used here comes from the official API of WHO (https://www.who.int/rss-feeds/news-english.xml).

Tools:

Random User Generator

This app uses an API from https://randomuser.me/. It randomly select a random person to be displayed in a browser.

Tools:

Google Doc like Text Editor

A text editor that has a functionality like Google Doc but a lot simpler. In this app you can format text, make it bold, italic and underline. You can also center-align, right-align and left-align. Document Object Model (DOM) manipulation has been practiced.

Tools:

Personal Blog

A personal blog site that I used to post anything that is on my mind that the readers may enjoy reading. This features full CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete) Functionality. This is created using HTML, CSS, Node.js and Express.
